title: Bubbles Goes to the Fair
description: Bubbles Goes to the Fair Bubbles the Toy Clown is excited because today is the Raggedy Land Fair, and he plans to enter to ball-juggling contest. He gets up early to practice. Once at the fair, however, he cannot find his juggling balls! Read what Bubbles the Toy Clown uses instead when he participates in the juggling contest. Will he win?
author: Lynx Books
